name: Enchanted Armor
description: A set of armor imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The armor is made of shining silver plates adorned with intricate runes. It radiates a soft glow and provides a regal appearance to the wearer.

special_effects.enchantment: Provides additional resistance to magical attacks.

name: Enchanted Amulet
description: A magical amulet infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The amulet is made of a rare crystal with a glowing core. It emits a soft, ethereal light.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of silver and engraved with ancient runes. It is studded with a large red gemstone that seems to radiate power.

special_effects.enhanced_power: Increases the user's physical strength and damage.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: An enchanted amulet that enhances the wisdom of its wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of silver and has a blue gemstone in the center. It has intricate engravings of symbols related to wisdom and knowledge.

special_effects.knowledge_enhancement: Increases the rate of gaining experience and knowledge

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff imbued with powerful healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It glows with a soft golden light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that regenerates the health of nearby allies.

name: Blade of Shadows
description: A deadly dagger infused with the essence of darkness.
looks: The Blade of Shadows is a sleek and slim dagger with a dark, ebony blade. It has a handle wrapped in black leather and a pommel adorned with a small black gem.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Allows the wielder to become invisible for a short duration after a successful hit.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of light and flexible armor made from animal hide.
looks: The armor consists of a chest piece, shoulder pads, gauntlets, and greaves. It is made from high-quality leather and is adorned with intricate stitching and metal rivets.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is capable of healing wounds and restoring health.
looks: The staff has a long, wooden shaft with delicate engravings. At the top of the staff, there is a glowing crystal that emits a soft, healing light.

special_weapon_skills.Healing Mastery: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

special_effects.healing_touch: Has a chance to restore additional health upon successful healing.
